message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV 

This paper proposes a novel approach for improving neural machine translation using conditional sequence generative adversarial nets. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also involves the use of adversarial training, which is a popular technique in the field of machine learning, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) another likely category. The paper also involves the use of reinforcement learning, which falls under the category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the paper involves the use of static sentence-level BLEU, which is a metric used for evaluating the quality of machine translation, making cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) another possible category. Finally, the paper involves the use of image captioning as an application of the proposed approach, which falls under the category of cs.CV (Computer Vision).
